spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent room adjacency and wall alignment. Door placement is mostly accurate, though the front entry door lacks its distinct 45-degree angle from the plan. Window placement in bedrooms is slightly distorted relative to the plan markers.

structural_fidelity.notes: Structural layout is very high fidelity. Roof is correctly removed. Deducted points for minor reinterpretation of the balcony/closet area and the addition of unnecessary support beams in the window nook.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is nearly perfect, including the specific L-shaped couch, dining table orientation, and kitchen island. Minor scaling issues with the bedroom nightstands.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Full marks. Perfect adherence to the low-poly, flat-shaded, non-textured aesthetic on a dark background. Isometric camera angle is correct.

detected_errors.description: The entry door to the apartment and bedroom doors are missing their specific floor-plan swing arcs/orientations.
Hallucinated structural beams added to the large bay window area in the living room.
